String.string: Use Seir's Order to go to Firebase Intrepid. [Press to open your inventory and right-click the Order: Fyrmount Support to teleport to Firebase Intrepid.]
So much is happening...with all the Toxic Gas...so many wounded...
Ask {@linkcreature:204#1003#Kimuk} at Firebase Intrepid where Sophilia is.
Ask {@linkcreature:204#1003#Kimuk} at Firebase Intrepid where Sophilia is.
Go to Blazing Vale where {@LinkCreature:4#904401#Sophilia} is rescuing civilians.
Tell Sophilia that you came to help.
Listen to Loomey's explanation of the phenomenon.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:4#904403#Loomey} just outside Firebase Valor.
Use the Talisman and break the link between the {@LinkObject:44401#Enlarged Smoldering Bloodshard} and the volcano.
Loomey seems dumbstruck and devastated, staring at Bahaar's Maw.
Go to Bahaar's Sanctum Entrance at Fyrmount. [You must have a flying mount to go to Bahaar's Sanctum Entrance.]
Speak with Halrath at Bahaar's Sanctum Entrance.
Use the {@LinkCreature:4#9044#teleportal} to enter Bahaar's Sanctum.
"I'll hold him as long as possible."
Enter Bahaar's Sanctum and defeat Bahaar.
Tell Halrath that you've defeated Bahaar.
